archimate:Node.name: CVM
archimate:Node.documentation:
Nutanix Controller VMs (CVM) on standard x86 hardware.
A Prism service runs on every CVM with an elected Prism Leader which is responsible for handling HTTP requests. Similar to other components which have a Master, if the Prism Leader fails, a new one will be elected.
The CVM of all Nutanix paltform are clustered (Nutanix Distributed Storage Fabric)
